ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Lambent Armor
ygData.msgSnippet: It is also part of a good quest for paladins. (Which is the reason my paladin, Ouara, was looking for Drosco) Ah well :) Sarah Heacock   sarah@eskimo.com Meara
ygData.messageBody:

my paladin, Ouara, was looking for Drosco) Ah well :)
